name: The Sentinel VR
description:
The Sentinel VR

[Prototype]

The Sentinel was inspired by games such as Brookhaven Experiment and suspenseful Western games, like Hunt: Showdown. The goal of the game was to create a tense, action-packed experience that places a heavy emphasis on player interactivity with in-game objects, such as weapons. The player manually has to get a bullet, load their weapon, aim and then fire; all while being horded by intimidating monsters.
